p: Six study sites, including Yuanyang (YY) and Zhoukou (ZK) in Henan Province, Yongnian (YN) and Shijiazhuang (SJZ) in Hebei Province, and Zaozhuang (ZZ) and Dezhou (DZ) in Shandong Province were selected ( Fig 1) because they are located in the major maize production area in the NCP, and high-quality data are available for the maize variety Xundan29, including the phenological stages of flowering and maturity, grain yield and management practices. The data were collected from the regional test of maize varieties in the Huanghuaihai area during 2008â€“2009 ( S1 Table).
